TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityBindTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 提供用于在 类与其他各种表示形式之间执行转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert classes to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 此转换器只能在 对象与字符串之间执行转换。This converter can only convert an object to and from a string. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅 TypeConverter 基类和 [如何：实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the TypeConverter base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 切勿创建 的实例，You should never create an instance of . 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关更多信息，请参见 类中的示例。For more information, see the examples in the class.

returns.span: 如果该转换器能够执行转换，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`），因此总是需要检查。This can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), so always check. 同样，`context` 对象的属性也可能返回空引用 (`Nothing`)。Also, properties on the `context` object can return a null reference (`Nothing`). > [!NOTE] > 重写该方法以提供您自己的转换要求。Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.

span.span: The that provides a format context.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文返回 数据类型的标准值的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of standard values for the data type using the specified context.

returns.span: 保存标准有效值集的 ；如果数据类型不支持标准值集，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: A that holds a standard set of valid values or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 可用来提取有关从中调用此转换器的环境的附加信息。`context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked. `context` 或者通过它提供的任何属性都可以是空引用 (`Nothing`) 。`context` or any property available through it can be a null reference (`Nothing`).

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool GetStandardValuesExclusive (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesExclusive(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValuesExclusive (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As Boolean
public: override bool GetStandardValuesExclusive(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);
override this.GetStandardValuesExclusive : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> bool

span.span: The that provides a format context.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文返回从 返回的标准值的集合是否为可能值的独占列表。

span.span: Returns whether the collection of standard values returned from is an exclusive list of possible values, using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果从 返回的 是可能值的穷举列表，则为 ；如果还可能有其他值，则为 。

span.span: if the returned from is an exhaustive list of possible values; if other values are possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该列表是独占的（如在枚举数据类型中），则其他任何值都无效。If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid. 如果该列表不是独占的，那么除 方法提供的标准值列表之外，可能还存在其他有效值。If the list is not exclusive, then other valid values might exist in addition to the list of standard values that the method provides. 如果这些值是独占的，则 返回的列表不应允许编辑这些值。If the values are exclusive, the list returned by should not allow these values to be edited.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool GetStandardValuesSupported (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesSupported(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValuesSupported (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As Boolean
public: override bool GetStandardValuesSupported(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);
override this.GetStandardValuesSupported : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> bool

span.span: The that provides a format context.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文返回此对象是否支持可以从列表中选取的标准值集。

span.span: Returns whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果应调用 来查找对象支持的一组公共值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `context` 参数提取有关调用此转换器的环境的附加信息。Use the `context` parameter to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked. 此参数可能为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`），因此总是需要检查。This parameter can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), so always check it. 同样，上下文对象的属性也可能返回空引用 (`Nothing`)。Also, properties on the context object can return a null reference (`Nothing`).
